title: Episode #49: The Way Of Men With Jack Donovan
description: In today's episode I talk to Jack Donovan, author of the book The Way of Men. We discuss is conception of a universal code of masculinity and if it's even possible to live "the way of men" in modern society.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
